name: Deploy Laravel App via FTP

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Remove unneeded files before deploy
        run: |
          rm -rf vendor
          rm -rf node_modules
          rm -rf tests
          rm -rf .git
          rm -f .env.example README.md phpunit.xml composer.lock vite.config.js webpack.mix.js yarn.lock package.json package-lock.json

      - name: Upload Laravel app (excluding vendor) via FTP
        uses: SamKirkland/FTP-Deploy-Action@v4.3.4
        with:
          server: ${{ secrets.FTP_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.FTP_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.FTP_PASSWORD }}
          local-dir: ./
          server-dir: ${{ secrets.FTP_PATH }}
          exclude: |
            **/vendor/**
            **/node_modules/**
            **/tests/**
            **/.git/**
            **/README.md
            **/phpunit.xml
